Keditance

Abstract Inheritance + Relationship = Absolute Inheritance

About Keditance Twitter Github LinkedIn Africase 

 graph
 A[Abstract Class] -- Inherit/Extends --> B(Parent Model)
 A -- Inherit/Extends --> C(Child Model 1)
 A -- Inherit/Extends --> D(Child Model 2)

 B --Relate--> C
 B --Relate--> D
